typeSystemDescription.name: PersuasivenessAnnotationMetaData
typeSystemDescription.description: Type system for meta data of documents annotated with its persuasiveness

typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.argumentation.types.PersuasivenessAnnotationMetaData
typeDescription.description: Metadata for storing annotations of persuasiveness

featureDescription.name: isPersuasive
featureDescription.description: True, if annotator labeled the document as persuasive (=P1), false otherwise (mandatory)

featureDescription.name: labelDetailed
featureDescription.description: Annotated label as string (either 'P1' = persuasive or 'Px' = non-persuasive with some sub-categories). (not required)

featureDescription.name: isGold
featureDescription.description: True, if this annotation is the 'gold' annotation; false otherwise

featureDescription.name: annotationBatchName
featureDescription.description: Name of the annotation batch (e.g. 'training', etc.) (not required)

featureDescription.name: conflictResolvingAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Determines whether this annotation was added in order to resolve conflicts among other annotators (not required)
